message.rftoolspower.powercell_card.head: Use to connect dimensional cells
message.rftoolspower.power_core1.header: This item is a crafting ingredient for powercells
message.rftoolspower.power_core2.header: This item is a crafting ingredient for powercells
message.rftoolspower.power_core3.header: This item is a crafting ingredient for powercells
message.rftoolspower.blazing_rod.header: This item is produced by the Blazing Agitator and used in the Blazing Generator to generate power
message.rftoolspower.cell1.header: This block can store power and can be combined with other cells to form a big multiblock. Right click with a wrench to toggle input/output mode for a side
message.rftoolspower.cell2.header: This block can store power and can be combined with other cells to form a big multiblock. Right click with a wrench to toggle input/output mode for a side
message.rftoolspower.cell3.header: This block can store power and can be combined with other cells to form a big multiblock. Right click with a wrench to toggle input/output mode for a side
message.rftoolspower.power_monitor.heade: 能量監控器可以根據目標方塊中的能量數量輸出紅石訊號
message.rftoolspower.power_level.header: 能量等級方塊會顯示一個代表某物能量數量的數字，同時也會發出相同數量的紅石訊號
message.rftoolspower.blazing_generator.h: Generate power out of blaze rods. These blaze rods have to be 'agitated' first using the Blazing Agitator
message.rftoolspower.blazing_agitator.he: This device can 'agitate' blaze rods so that they are usable for the Blazing Generator
message.rftoolspower.blazing_agitator.go: Infusing bonus: better quality blazing rods
message.rftoolspower.blazing_infuser.hea: 此裝置可以使用維度碎片、紅石或螢石粉給烈焰桿注能。這將會提高使用烈焰發電機時的能量產生和/或持續時間
message.rftoolspower.endergenic.header: Generate power out of ender pearls. You need at least two generators for this to work and the setup is relatively complicated. Timing is crucial
message.rftoolspower.endergenic.gold: Infusing bonus: more power generation and reduced powerloss for holding pearls
message.rftoolspower.ender_monitor.heade: 此方塊可以偵測相鄰的終界能發電機的各種變化，然後輸出紅石訊號
message.rftoolspower.pearl_injector.head: 當接收到紅石訊號時，會將終界珍珠注入相鄰的終界能發電機
message.rftoolspower.coalgenerator.heade: This machine produces RF/FE from coal or charcoal
message.rftoolspower.coalgenerator.gold: Infusing bonus: more power generation and lasts longer on a single fuel
message.rftoolspower.dimensionalcell.hea: This block can store power. Optionally in a big multi dimensional structure
message.rftoolspower.dimensionalcell.gol: Infusing bonus: reduced long distance power extraction cost and increased RF/tick output
message.rftoolspower.dimensionalcell_adv: This block can store power. Optionally in a big multi dimensional structure
Infusing bonus: reduced long distance power extraction cost and increased RF/tick output
message.rftoolspower.dimensionalcell_sim: This block can store power. Optionally in a big multi dimensional structure
Infusing bonus: reduced long distance power extraction cost and increased RF/tick output
message.rftoolspower.dimensionalcell_cre: This block can store power. Optionally in a big multi dimensional structure
Infusing bonus: reduced long distance power extraction cost and increased RF/tick output
